              def log_admin_access
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info ": #{controller_name}##{action_name} - User: #{current_user.id} (#{current_user.name}) - IP: #{request.remote_ip}"
          
      22.

              def per_page
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                params[:per_page]&.to_i&.clamp(MIN_PER_PAGE, MAX_PER_PAGE) || DEFAULT_PER_PAGE
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

              end

              def search_params

            class Admin::CommentsController < Admin::BaseController
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

              before_action :set_comment, only: [ :show, :edit, :update, :destroy ]
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

            
          
      6.

              def index
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

                @comments = filter_and_sort_comments
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

                @total_count = Comment.count
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                @today_count = Comment.where(created_at: Date.current.all_day).count
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

            
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                log_admin_action("", "Comment", ": #{search_params.to_h}")
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

              end

    13.

              def show

              end

              def update
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                if @comment.update(comment_params)
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                  admin_flash_success("")
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                  log_admin_action("", "Comment", @comment.id)
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                  redirect_to admin_comment_path(@comment)
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                else
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                  admin_flash_error("")
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                  render :edit, status: :unprocessable_entity
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30.

              def destroy
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                comment_info = "ID: #{@comment.id}, : #{@comment.user.name}, : #{@comment.excerpt(50)}"
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

            
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                if @comment.destroy
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                  admin_flash_success("")
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                  log_admin_action("", "Comment", @comment.id, comment_info)
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                  redirect_to admin_comments_path
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40.

    41. 
            

            

                  admin_flash_error("")
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42.

      43.

      44.

              end

              def set_comment
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                @comment = Comment.find(params[:id])
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

              rescue ActiveRecord::RecordNotFound
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                admin_flash_error("")
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                redirect_to admin_comments_path
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

              end
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54.

              # 
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

              def filter_and_sort_comments
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                comments = Comment.includes(:user, :gift_record)
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

            
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                # 
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                if params[:search].present?
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                  search_term = "%#{params[:search]}%"
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                  comments = comments.joins(:user)
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                                    .where("comments.body ILIKE ? OR users.name ILIKE ?",
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                                           search_term, search_term)
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                end
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

            
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                # 
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                if params[:user_id].present?
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                  comments = comments.where(user_id: params[:user_id])
          
      70.

                end
          
      71.

                #

      74.

      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

                end
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

                if params[:date_to].present?
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

                  comments = comments.where("comments.created_at <= ?", Date.parse(params[:date_to]))
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

                end
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

            
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

                # 
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

                case params[:sort]
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

                when "body"
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

                  comments = comments.order(body: sort_direction)
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

                when "user_name"
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

                  comments = comments.joins(:user).order("users.name #{sort_direction}")
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

                else
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87.

      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

                end
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

            
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

                # 
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91.

    92. 
            

            

              end
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93.

              def sort_direction
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            

                params[:direction] == "asc" ? :asc : :desc
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97.

              def set_event

              def event_params

              def set_gift_person
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                @gift_person = GiftPerson.find(params[:id])
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

              rescue ActiveRecord::RecordNotFound
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                admin_flash_error("")
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45.

    46. 
            

            

              end
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

            
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

              def filter_and_sort_gift_people
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                people = GiftPerson.includes(:user, :relationship)
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

            
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                if params[:search].present?
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                  search_term = "%#{params[:search]}%"
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                  people = people.where("name ILIKE ?", search_term)
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                end
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

            
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                people.order(created_at: :desc).page(params[:page]).per(per_page)
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

              end
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

            
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

              # 
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

              def build_person_statistics(person)
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                {
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                  gift_records_count: person.gift_records.count,
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                  public_gift_records_count: person.gift_records.where(is_public: true).count,
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                  recent_gift_records: person.gift_records.includes(:user, :gift_item_category, :event)
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                                             .order(gift_at: :desc, created_at: :desc)
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                                             .limit(5),
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                  latest_gift_at: person.gift_records.maximum(:gift_at) || person.gift_records.maximum(:created_at),
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                  total_favorites_count: person.gift_records.joins(:favorites).count,
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                  total_comments_count: person.gift_records.joins(:comments).count
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

                }
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

              end
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

            
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

              def gift_person_params
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

                params.require(:gift_person).permit(:name, :relationship_id, :birthday, :likes, :dislikes, :address, :memo, :avatar)
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

              end
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

            end
          
      77.

            class Admin::GiftRecordsController < Admin::BaseController

              def destroy
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                record_info = "ID: #{@gift_record.id}, : #{@gift_record.display_item_name}, : #{@gift_record.user.name}"

      42.

                  redirect_to admin_gift_record_path(@gift_record)
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                end
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

              end
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

            
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

              # /
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

              def toggle_public
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                old_status = @gift_record.is_public? ? "" : ""
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                new_status = @gift_record.is_public? ? "" : ""
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

            
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                if @gift_record.update(is_public: !@gift_record.is_public?)
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                  admin_flash_success("#{@gift_record.display_item_name}#{new_status}")
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                  log_admin_action("", "GiftRecord", @gift_record.id, "#{old_status}  #{new_status}")
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                else
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                  admin_flash_error("")
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                end
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

            
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                redirect_to admin_gift_record_path(@gift_record)
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

              end
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

            
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

              private
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

            
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

              def set_gift_record
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                @gift_record = GiftRecord.find(params[:id])
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

              rescue ActiveRecord::RecordNotFound
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                admin_flash_error("")
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                redirect_to admin_gift_records_path
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

              end
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

            
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

              # 
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

              def filter_and_sort_gift_records
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

                records = GiftRecord.includes(:user, :gift_person, :event, :gift_item_category)
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

            
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

                # 
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

                if params[:search].present?
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

                  search_term = "%#{params[:search]}%"
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

                  records = records.joins(:user, :gift_person)
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

                                  .where("gift_records.item_name ILIKE ? OR users.name ILIKE ? OR gift_people.name ILIKE ?",
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

                                         search_term, search_term, search_term)
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

                end
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

            
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

                # 
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

                case params[:is_public]
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

                when "true"
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

                  records = records.where(is_public: true)
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

                when "false"
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

                  records = records.where(is_public: false)
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

                end
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

            
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            

                # 
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            

                case params[:gift_direction]
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            

                when "received"
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            

                  records = records.where(gift_direction: :received)
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            

                when "given"
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            

                  records = records.where(gift_direction: :given)
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            

                end
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            

            
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            

                # 
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            

                if params[:user_id].present?
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            

                  records = records.where(user_id: params[:user_id])
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            

                end
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            

            
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            

                # 
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            

                if params[:date_from].present?
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            

                  records = records.where("gift_at >= ?", Date.parse(params[:date_from]))
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            

                end
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            

                if params[:date_to].present?
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            

                  records = records.where("gift_at <= ?", Date.parse(params[:date_to]))
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            

                end
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            

            
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            

                # 
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            

                case params[:sort]
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            

                when "item_name"
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            

                  records = records.order(item_name: sort_direction)
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            

                when "gift_at"
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            

                  records = records.order(gift_at: sort_direction)
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            

                when "user_name"
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            

                  records = records.joins(:user).order("users.name #{sort_direction}")
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            

                when "is_public"
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            

                  records = records.order(is_public: sort_direction)
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            

                else
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            

                  records = records.order(created_at: sort_direction)
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            

                end
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            

            
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            

                # 
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            

                records.page(params[:page]).per(per_page)
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            

              end
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            

            
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            

              # 
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            

              def sort_direction
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            

                params[:direction] == "asc" ? :asc : :desc
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            

              end
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            

            
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            

              # 
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            

              def build_record_statistics(record)
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            

                {
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            

                  comments_count: record.comments.count,
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            

                  favorites_count: record.favorites.count,
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            

                  images_count: record.images_count,
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            

                  recent_comments: record.comments.includes(:user).order(created_at: :desc).limit(5)
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            

                }
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            

              end
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            

            
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            

              # 
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            

              def gift_record_params
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            

                params.require(:gift_record).permit(
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            

                  :item_name, :memo, :is_public, :commentable, :gift_direction,
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            

                  :amount, :gift_at, :event_id, :gift_item_category_id,
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            

                  images: [], delete_image_ids: []
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            

                )
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            

              end
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            

            end

            class Admin::StatisticsController < Admin::BaseController
          
      3.

              FIRST_MONTH = 1

    4. 
            

            

              LAST_MONTH = 12
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

              FIRST_DAY_OF_MONTH = 1
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

              LAST_DAY_OF_YEAR = 31
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

              MONTHS_PER_YEAR = LAST_MONTH

              BACKTRACE_LINES = 5

              def index

              def build_detailed_statistics
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "===  ==="
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info ": #{Date.current.year}"
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info ": #{User.count}"
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info ": #{GiftRecord.count}"
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info ": #{Comment.count}"
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

            
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                stats = {
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                  users: build_user_statistics,

              def build_user_statistics
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                # 
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                user_counts = User.group(:role).count
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                provider_counts = User.group("provider IS NOT NULL").count
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

            
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                #

    42. 
            

            

                year_start = Time.zone.local(current_year, FIRST_MONTH, FIRST_DAY_OF_MONTH).beginning_of_day

                monthly_data = User.where(created_at: year_start..year_end)
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                                  .group("EXTRACT(month FROM created_at)")

                # EXTRACT

                monthly_registrations = (FIRST_MONTH..LAST_MONTH).map do |month|
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                  monthly_data[month.to_f] || monthly_data[month.to_s] || monthly_data[month] || 0

              def calculate_monthly_data_alternative(model, year_start, year_end)
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info ": #{model.name}"
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            

            

            
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            

                (FIRST_MONTH..LAST_MONTH).map do |month|
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            

                  month_start = Time.zone.local(Date.current.year, month, FIRST_DAY_OF_MONTH).beginning_of_month
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            

                  month_end = month_start.end_of_month
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            

                  count = model.where(created_at: month_start..month_end).count
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.debug "#{month}: #{count}"
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            

            

                  count
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            

                end
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            

            

              rescue => e
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.error ": #{e.message}"
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            

            

                Array.new(MONTHS_PER_YEAR, 0)
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            

            

              end
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            

            

            end
          
      189.

            class Admin::UsersController < Admin::BaseController
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

              before_action :set_user, only: [ :show, :edit, :update, :toggle_role, :toggle_status ]
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

            
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

              def index
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

                @users = filter_and_sort_users
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

                @total_count = User.count
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                @admin_count = User.admin.count
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10.

    11.

              end
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

            
          
      15.

              def show
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                @user_statistics = build_user_statistics(@user)
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                log_admin_action("", "User", @user.id)
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

              end
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

            
          
      20.

              def edit
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                log_admin_action("", "User", @user.id)
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

              end
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

            
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

              def update
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                if @user.update(user_params)
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                  admin_flash_success("")
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                  log_admin_action("", "User", @user.id)
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                  redirect_to admin_user_path(@user)
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                else
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                  admin_flash_error("")
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                  render :edit, status: :unprocessable_entity
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                end
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

              end
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

            
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

              # 
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

              def toggle_role
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                # 
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                if @user == current_user
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                  admin_flash_error("")
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                  redirect_to admin_user_path(@user)
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                  return
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                end
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

            
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                old_role = @user.role
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                new_role = @user.admin? ? "general" : "admin"
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

            
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                if @user.update(role: new_role)
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                  admin_flash_success("#{@user.name}#{User.human_attribute_name("role.#{new_role}")}")
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                  log_admin_action("", "User", @user.id, "#{old_role}  #{new_role}")
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                else
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                  admin_flash_error("")
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                end
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

            
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                redirect_to admin_user_path(@user)
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

              end
          
      56.

              def set_user

              def filter_and_sort_users
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

                users = User.all
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

            
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

                # 
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

                if params[:search].present?
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

                  search_term = "%#{params[:search]}%"
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

                  users = users.where("name ILIKE ? OR email ILIKE ?", search_term, search_term)
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

                end
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

            
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

                # 
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

                if params[:role].present? && User.roles.key?(params[:role])
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

                  users = users.where(role: params[:role])
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

                end
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

            
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

                # LINE vs 
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

                case params[:provider]
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

                when "line"
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

                  users = users.where.not(provider: nil)
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            

                when "email"
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            

                  users = users.where(provider: nil)
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            

                end
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            

            
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            

                # 
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            

                case params[:sort]
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            

                when "name"
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            

                  users = users.order(name: sort_direction)
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            

                when "email"
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            

                  users = users.order(email: sort_direction)
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            

                when "role"
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            

                  users = users.order(role: sort_direction)
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            

                when "gift_records_count"
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            

                  users = users.left_joins(:gift_records)
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            

                              .group(:id)
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            

                              .order("COUNT(gift_records.id) #{sort_direction}")
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            

                else
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            

                  users = users.order(created_at: sort_direction)
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            

                end
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            

            
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            

                # 
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            

                users.page(params[:page]).per(per_page)
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            

              end
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            

            
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            

              # 
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            

              def sort_direction
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            

                params[:direction] == "asc" ? :asc : :desc
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            

              end
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            

            
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            

              # 
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            

              def build_user_statistics(user)
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            

                {
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            

                  gift_records_count: user.gift_records.count,
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            

                  gift_people_count: user.gift_people.count,
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            

                  comments_count: user.comments.count,
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            

                  favorites_count: user.favorites.count,
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            

                  reminds_count: user.reminds.count,
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            

                  public_gift_records_count: user.gift_records.where(is_public: true).count,
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            

                  recent_activity: user.gift_records.order(created_at: :desc).limit(5)
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            

                }
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            

              end
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            

            
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            

              #

              def set_flash_message(type, key, options = {})

            class CommentsController < ApplicationController

              before_action :authenticate_user!

              before_action :set_gift_record

              before_action :check_commentable, only: [ :create ]

              before_action :set_comment, only: [ :edit, :update, :destroy ]

              def create
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                @comment = @gift_record.comments.build(comment_params)
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                @comment.user = current_user
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

            
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                respond_to do |format|
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                  if @comment.save
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                    format.html { redirect_to @gift_record, notice: "" }
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                    format.json { render json: { success: true, comment: comment_json(@comment) } }
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                  else
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                    format.html { redirect_to @gift_record, alert: "" }
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                    format.json { render json: { success: false, errors: @comment.errors.full_messages } }
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                  end
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                end
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

              end
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22.

              def edit

                  format.html

              def update
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                respond_to do |format|
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                  if @comment.update(comment_params)
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                    format.html { redirect_to @gift_record, notice: "" }
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                    format.json { render json: { success: true, comment: comment_json(@comment) } }
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                  else
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                    format.html { render :edit }
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                    format.json { render json: { success: false, errors: @comment.errors.full_messages } }
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                  end
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                end
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

              end

            module AgeFilterable

              AGE_GROUPS = {
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

                "10s" => [ 10, 19 ],
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

                "20s" => [ 20, 29 ],
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

                "30s" => [ 30, 39 ],
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                "40s" => [ 40, 49 ],
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                "50s" => [ 50, 59 ],
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                "60s" => [ 60, 69 ],
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                "70s" => [ 70, 79 ],
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                "80plus" => [ 80, nil ]

    14. 
            

            

              }.freeze
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15.

              #

              # return: [from_date, to_date]

              # - from_date/to_date  nil 80
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

              def birthday_range_for(age_group, reference_date = Date.current)
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                group = AGE_GROUPS[age_group.to_s]
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                return [ nil, nil ] unless group
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

            
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                min_age, max_age = group
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

            
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                if max_age.nil?
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                  # 80:  <= today - 80
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                  to = reference_date.years_ago(min_age)
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                  [ nil, to ]
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                else
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                  # : 20-29  [today-30y+1d, today-20y]
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                  from = (reference_date.years_ago(max_age + 1)) + 1.day
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                  to   = reference_date.years_ago(min_age)
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                  [ from, to ]
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                end
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

              end
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

            end
          
      37.

              def self.prepare_text(text)
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                sanitized = text.to_s.strip
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                sanitized = "" if sanitized.blank?
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

            
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                sanitized.each_char
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                         .each_slice(SUBTITLE_CHARS_PER_LINE)
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                         .map { |chars| chars.join }
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                         .first(SUBTITLE_ROW_LIMIT)
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                         .join("\n")
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

              end
          
      65.

            end

              # AJAXToggle

              def toggle

                  format.json do

    11. 
            

            

                    if result[:success]

                        success: true,

                        success: false,

    21.

      22.

      23.

      24.

      26.

      33.

              rescue StandardError => e

              def index
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                favorites_scope = current_user.favorites
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                  .includes(gift_record: [ :gift_person, :event, :user, { gift_person: :relationship } ])
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                  .recent
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

            
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                # 
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                accessible_favorites = favorites_scope.select do |favorite|
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                  gift_record = favorite.gift_record
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                  gift_record.present? &&
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                  (gift_record.user_id == current_user.id || gift_record.is_public?)
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                end
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

            
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                @total_favorites = accessible_favorites.size
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                @favorites = Kaminari.paginate_array(accessible_favorites)
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

                  .page(params[:page])
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

                  .per(per_page_count)
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

                @pagination_params = favorites_pagination_params
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

              end
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74.

              private

              def set_gift_record
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

                @gift_record = GiftRecord.find(params[:id])
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

            
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

                #

    81.

      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

                  respond_to do |format|
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

                    format.json { render json: { success: false, error: "" }, status: :forbidden }
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

                    format.html { redirect_to gift_records_path, alert: "" }
          
      85.

      86.

                end
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

              rescue ActiveRecord::RecordNotFound

    88. 
            

            

                respond_to do |format|

              def format_errors(errors)

    95. 
            

            

                return "" unless errors.respond_to?(:full_messages)

                errors.full_messages.join(", ")

      98.

              def per_page_count
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            

                @per_page_count ||= if request.user_agent =~ /Mobile|Android|iPhone|iPad/
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            

                  12
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            

                else
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            

                  15
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            

                end
          
      105.

              end

              def favorites_pagination_params

    109. 
            

            

              end

              SECONDARY_RESULTS_LIMIT = 3

              def autocomplete
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                query = params[:q]&.strip

    31. 
            

            

            
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                if query.present? && query.length >= MIN_QUERY_LENGTH
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                  search_term = "%#{query}%"
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

            
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                  # 
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                  name_results = current_user.gift_people
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                    .includes(:relationship)
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                    .where.not(name: [ nil, "" ])
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                    .where("gift_people.name ILIKE ?", search_term)
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40.

    41.

      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                      {
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                        id: person.id,
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                        name: person.name,
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                        relationship: person.relationship&.name || "",
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                        type: "name",
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47.

    48. 
            

            

                        input_text: person.name,

    49.

      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                      }
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                    end
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

            
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                  #

                end
