      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            

                  results: [],
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            

                  total_count: 0,
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            

                  error: ""
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            

                }, status: :internal_server_error
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            

              end
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            

            
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            

              def show
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            

                # : set_gift_personensure_owner
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            

                @gift_records = @gift_person.user.gift_records
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            

                  .where(gift_people_id: @gift_person.id)
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            

                  .includes(:event)
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            

                  .order(gift_at: :desc)
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            

                  .limit(NAME_RESULTS_LIMIT)
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            

              end
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            

            
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            

              def new
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            

                @gift_person = current_user.gift_people.build
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            

                @line_connected = current_user.line_connected?
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            

                @remind_form_values = {}
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            

                @remind_form_enabled = false
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            

                prepare_relationships_for_form
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            

                prepare_remind_for_form
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            

              end
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            

            
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            

              def create
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            

                @line_connected = current_user.line_connected?
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            

                @gift_person = current_user.gift_people.build(gift_person_params)
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            

                @remind_form_values = permitted_remind_params.to_h.transform_values { |value| value.presence }
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            

                @remind_form_enabled = remind_form_enabled?(@remind_form_values)
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            

                @remind_form_enabled &&= @line_connected
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            

                prepare_remind_for_form
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            

            
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            

                success = true
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            

            
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            

                ActiveRecord::Base.transaction do
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            

                success &&= @gift_person.save
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            

            
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            

                if success && @remind_form_enabled
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            

                  success &&= build_and_save_remind_for(@gift_person, @remind_form_values)
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            

                end
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            

            
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            

                  raise ActiveRecord::Rollback unless success
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            

                end
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            

            
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            

                if success
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            

                  flash_success(:created, item: "#{@gift_person.name}")
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            

                  redirect_to gift_people_path
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            

                else
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            

                  prepare_relationships_for_form
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            

                  prepare_remind_for_form
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            

                  @remind_form_enabled = true if @remind&.errors&.any?
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            

                  flash.now[:alert] = ""
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            

                  render :new, status: :unprocessable_entity
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            

                end
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            

              end
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            

            
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            

              def edit
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            

                # : set_gift_personensure_owner
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            

                prepare_relationships_for_form
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            

              end
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            

            
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            

              def update
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            

                # 
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            

                if params[:gift_person][:remove_avatar] == "1"
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            

                  @gift_person.avatar.purge if @gift_person.avatar.attached?
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            

                end
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            

            
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            

                # remove_avatar
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            

                update_params = gift_person_params
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            

            

                update_params.delete(:remove_avatar)
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            

            
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            

                if @gift_person.update(update_params)
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            

                  flash_success(:updated, item: "#{@gift_person.name}")
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            

                  redirect_to @gift_person
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            

            

                else
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            

            

                  prepare_relationships_for_form
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            

                  flash.now[:alert] = ""
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            

            

                  render :edit, status: :unprocessable_entity
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            

            

                end
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            

            

              end
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            

            

            
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            

            

              def destroy
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            

            

                name = @gift_person.name
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            

            

                if @gift_person.destroy
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            

            

                  flash[:notice] = "#{name}"
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            

            

                  redirect_to gift_people_path
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            

            

                else
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            

            

                  flash[:alert] = ""
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            

            

                  redirect_to gift_people_path
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            

            

                end
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            

            

              rescue StandardError => e
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.error "GiftPerson deletion error: #{e.message}"
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            

            

                flash[:alert] = ""
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            

            

                redirect_to gift_people_path
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            

            

              end
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            

            

            
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            

            

              private
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            

            

            
          
      205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    205. 
            

            

              def gift_person_params
          
      206. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    206. 
            

            

                params.require(:gift_person).permit(:name, :relationship_id, :birthday, :likes, :dislikes, :address, :memo, :avatar, :remove_avatar)
          
      207. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    207. 
            

            

              end
          
      208. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    208. 
            

            

            
          
      209. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    209. 
            

            

              def set_gift_person
          
      210. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    210. 
            

            

                @gift_person = current_user.gift_people
          
      211. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    211. 
            

            

                  .includes(:relationship)
          
      212. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    212. 
            

            

                  .find(params[:id])
          
      213. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    213. 
            

            

              rescue ActiveRecord::RecordNotFound
          
      214. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    214. 
            

            

                redirect_to gift_people_path, alert: ""
          
      215. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    215. 
            

            

              end
          
      216. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    216. 
            

            

            
          
      217. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    217. 
            

            

              def ensure_owner
          
      218. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    218. 
            

            

                unless @gift_person&.user == current_user
          
      219. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    219. 
            

            

                  redirect_to gift_people_path, alert: ""
          
      220. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    220. 
            

            

                end
          
      221. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    221. 
            

            

              end
          
      222. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    222. 
            

            

            
          
      223. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    223. 
            

            

              def prepare_relationships_for_form
          
      224. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    224. 
            

            

                @relationships = Relationship.active.ordered
          
      225. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    225. 
            

            

              end
          
      226. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    226. 
            

            

            
          
      227. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    227. 
            

            

              def prepare_remind_for_form
          
      228. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    228. 
            

            

                @remind_form_values ||= {}
          
      229. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    229. 
            

            

                @remind ||= current_user.reminds.build
          
      230. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    230. 
            

            

                if @remind_form_values.present?
          
      231. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    231. 
            

            

                  @remind.notification_at = @remind_form_values[:notification_at]
          
      232. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    232. 
            

            

                end
          
      233. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    233. 
            

            

                @remindable_gift_people = current_user.gift_people.includes(:relationship).order(:name)
          
      234. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    234. 
            

            

                if @line_connected && @remind&.errors&.any?
          
      235. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    235. 
            

            

                  @remind_form_enabled = true
          
      236. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    236. 
            

            

                end
          
      237. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    237. 
            

            

              end
          
      238. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    238. 
            

            

            
          
      239. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    239. 
            

            

              def permitted_remind_params
          
      240. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    240. 
            

            

                if params[:remind].present?
          
      241. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    241. 
            

            

                  params.require(:remind).permit(:notification_at, :notification_days_before, :notification_time)
          
      242. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    242. 
            

            

                elsif params.dig(:gift_person, :remind).present?
          
      243. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    243. 
            

            

                  params.require(:gift_person).require(:remind).permit(:notification_at, :notification_days_before, :notification_time)
          
      244. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    244. 
            

            

                else
          
      245. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    245. 
            

            

                  {}
          
      246. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    246. 
            

            

                end
          
      247. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    247. 
            

            

              end
          
      248. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    248. 
            

            

            
          
      249. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    249. 
            

            

              def remind_form_enabled?(values)
          
      250. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    250. 
            

            

                values.values.compact.any?
          
      251. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    251. 
            

            

              end
          
      252. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    252. 
            

            

            
          
      253. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    253. 
            

            

              def build_and_save_remind_for(gift_person, values)
          
      254. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    254. 
            

            

                @remind.gift_person = gift_person
          
      255. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    255. 
            

            

                @remind.notification_at = values[:notification_at]
          
      256. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    256. 
            

            

            
          
      257. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    257. 
            

            

                days_before = values[:notification_days_before]
          
      258. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    258. 
            

            

                time_str = values[:notification_time]
          
      259. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    259. 
            

            

            
          
      260. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    260. 
            

            

                if days_before.blank? || time_str.blank?
          
      261. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    261. 
            

            

                  @remind.errors.add(:base, "")
          
      262. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    262. 
            

            

                  return false
          
      263. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    263. 
            

            

                end
          
      264. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    264. 
            

            

            
          
      265. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    265. 
            

            

                unless @remind.set_notification_sent_at(days_before, time_str)
          
      266. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    266. 
            

            

                  return false
          
      267. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    267. 
            

            

                end
          
      268. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    268. 
            

            

            
          
      269. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    269. 
            

            

                @remind.save
          
      270. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    270. 
            

            

              end
          
      271. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    271. 
            

            

            
          
      272. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    272. 
            

            

              # 
          
      273. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    273. 
            

            

              def highlight_match(text, query)
          
      274. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    274. 
            

            

                return ERB::Util.html_escape(text) unless text.present? && query.present?
          
      275. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    275. 
            

            

            
          
      276. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    276. 
            

            

                escaped_text = ERB::Util.html_escape(text)
          
      277. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    277. 
            

            

                escaped_query = ERB::Util.html_escape(query)
          
      278. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    278. 
            

            

            
          
      279. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    279. 
            

            

                escaped_text.gsub(Regexp.new(Regexp.escape(escaped_query), Regexp::IGNORECASE)) do |match|
          
      280. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    280. 
            

            

                  "<mark>#{match}</mark>"
          
      281. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    281. 
            

            

                end.html_safe
          
      282. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    282. 
            

            

              rescue StandardError
          
      283. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    283. 
            

            

                ERB::Util.html_escape(text)
          
      284. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    284. 
            

            

              end
          
      285. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    285. 
            

            

            
          
      286. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    286. 
            

            

              def truncate_text(text, length = TRUNCATE_DEFAULT_LENGTH)
          
      287. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    287. 
            

            

                return "" unless text.present?
          
      288. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    288. 
            

            

            
          
      289. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    289. 
            

            

                text.length > length ? "#{text[0..length-1]}..." : text
          
      290. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    290. 
            

            

              end
          
      291. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    291. 
            

            

            
          
      292. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    292. 
            

            

              # 
          
      293. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    293. 
            

            

              def gift_people_pagination_params
          
      294. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    294. 
            

            

                params.permit(
          
      295. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    295. 
            

            

                  :search,
          
      296. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    296. 
            

            

                  :relationship_id,
          
      297. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    297. 
            

            

                  :age_group,
          
      298. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    298. 
            

            

                  :gender,
          
      299. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    299. 
            

            

                  :filter_type,
          
      300. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    300. 
            

            

                  :event_id,
          
      301. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    301. 
            

            

                  :sort_by,
          
      302. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    302. 
            

            

                  :sort_order
          
      303. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    303. 
            

            

                ).to_h
          
      304. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    304. 
            

            

              end
          
      305. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    305. 
            

            

            
          
      306. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    306. 
            

            

              def build_base_query
          
      307. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    307. 
            

            

                current_user.gift_people
          
      308. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    308. 
            

            

                  .includes(:relationship)
          
      309. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    309. 
            

            

                  .where.not(name: [ nil, "" ])
          
      310. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    310. 
            

            

              end
          
      311. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    311. 
            

            

            
          
      312. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    312. 
            

            

              def apply_search_and_filters
          
      313. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    313. 
            

            

                # 
          
      314. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    314. 
            

            

                if params[:search].present?
          
      315. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    315. 
            

            

                  search_term = "%#{params[:search]}%"
          
      316. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    316. 
            

            

                  @gift_people = @gift_people.where(
          
      317. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    317. 
            

            

                    "gift_people.name ILIKE ? OR gift_people.memo ILIKE ? OR gift_people.likes ILIKE ? OR gift_people.dislikes ILIKE ?",
          
      318. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    318. 
            

            

                    search_term, search_term, search_term, search_term
          
      319. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    319. 
            

            

                  )
          
      320. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    320. 
            

            

                end

                  if from && to

              def per_page_count
          
      353. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    353. 
            

            

                @per_page_count ||= if request.user_agent =~ /Mobile|Android|iPhone|iPad/

    354. 
            

            

                  MOBILE_PER_PAGE

    355. 
            

            

                else

              def apply_sorting_and_pagination
          
      361. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    361. 
            

            

                sort_by = params[:sort_by].presence
          
      362. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    362. 
            

            

                sort_order = params[:sort_order].presence || "desc"
          
      363. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    363. 
            

            

            
          
      364. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    364. 
            

            

                case sort_by
          
      365. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    365. 
            

            

                when "gift_records_count"
          
      366. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    366. 
            

            

                  @gift_people = @gift_people
          
      367. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    367. 
            

            

                    .left_joins(:gift_records)
          
      368. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    368. 
            

            

                    .select("gift_people.*, COUNT(gift_records.id) as gift_records_count")
          
      369. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    369. 
            

            

                    .group("gift_people.id")
          
      370. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    370. 
            

            

                    .order("gift_records_count #{sort_order}, gift_people.name #{sort_order}")
          
      371. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    371. 
            

            

                    .page(params[:page]).per(per_page_count)
          
      372. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    372. 
            

            

                else
          
      373. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    373. 
            

            

                  # 
          
      374. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    374. 
            

            

                  @gift_people = @gift_people.order(:name)
          
      375. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    375. 
            

            

                    .page(params[:page]).per(per_page_count)
          
      376. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    376. 
            

            

                end
          
      377. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    377. 
            

            

            
          
      378. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    378. 
            

            

                @pagination_params = gift_people_pagination_params
          
      379. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    379. 
            

            

              end
          
      380. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    380. 
            

            

            
          
      381. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    381. 
            

            

              def prepare_filter_options
          
      382. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    382. 
            

            

                @relationship_options = build_relationship_options
          
      383.

                @event_options = build_event_options

      385. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    385.

              def build_relationship_options
          
      387. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    387. 
            

            

                # ID
          
      388. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    388. 
            

            

                # RelationshippositionDB
          
      389. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    389. 
            

            

                rel_ids = current_user.gift_people.select("DISTINCT relationship_id")
          
      390. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    390. 
            

            

                Relationship.where(id: rel_ids).ordered.pluck(:name, :id)
          
      391. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    391. 
            

            

              end
          
      392. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    392. 
            

            

            
          
      393.

              def build_event_options
          
      394. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    394. 
            

            

                event_ids = current_user.gift_people
          
      395. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    395. 
            

            

                  .joins(:gift_records)
          
      396. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    396. 
            

            

                  .select("DISTINCT gift_records.event_id")
          
      397. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    397. 
            

            

                Event.where(id: event_ids).order(:name).pluck(:name, :id)
          
      398. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    398. 
            

            

              end
          
      399. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    399. 
            

            

            end

      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            

            
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            

                # imagesdelete_image_ids
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            

                update_params = gift_record_params.except(:images, :delete_image_ids)
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.debug "Update params (without images): #{update_params.inspect}"
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            

            
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            

                if @gift_record.update(update_params)
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            

                  # 
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            

                  if new_images.present?
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            

                    # 
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            

                    valid_new_images = new_images.select { |img| img.present? && img.respond_to?(:tempfile) }
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.debug "Valid new images count: #{valid_new_images.count}"
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            

            
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            

                  if valid_new_images.any?
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            

                    # attach
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            

                    @gift_record.images.attach(valid_new_images)
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            

                    @gift_record.images.reload
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.debug " ()"
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            

                  end
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            

                  end
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            

            
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.debug ": #{@gift_record.images.count}"
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            

                  flash_success(:updated, item: GiftRecord.model_name.human)
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            

                  redirect_params = params.permit(:origin, :page).to_h
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            

                  redirect_to gift_record_path(@gift_record, redirect_params)
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            

                else
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.debug ": #{@gift_record.errors.full_messages}"
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            

                  @gift_people = current_user.gift_people.where.not(name: [ nil, "" ])
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            

                  prepare_events_for_form
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            

                  flash.now[:alert] = t("defaults.flash_message.not_updated", item: GiftRecord.model_name.human)
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            

                  render :edit, status: :unprocessable_entity
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            

                end
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            

              rescue StandardError => e
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.error "GiftRecord update error: #{e.message}"
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.error e.backtrace.join("\n")
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            

                @gift_people = current_user.gift_people.where.not(name: [ nil, "" ])
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            

                prepare_events_for_form
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            

                flash.now[:alert] = ""
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            

                render :edit, status: :unprocessable_entity
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            

              end
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            

            
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            

              def destroy
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            

                item_name = @gift_record.item_name.presence || DEFAULT_ITEM_NAME
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            

            
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            

                if @gift_record.destroy
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            

                  flash[:notice] = "#{item_name}"
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            

                  redirect_to gift_records_path
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            

            

                else
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            

                  flash[:alert] = ""
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            

                  redirect_to gift_records_path
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            

                end
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            

              rescue StandardError => e
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.error "GiftRecord deletion error: #{e.message}"
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            

            

                flash[:alert] = ""
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            

                redirect_to gift_records_path
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            

            

              end
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            

            

            
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            

            

              # API
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            

            

              def autocomplete
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            

            

                query = params[:q]&.strip
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            

            

            
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            

            

                if query.present? && query.length >= MIN_AUTOCOMPLETE_QUERY_LENGTH
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            

            

                  search_term = "%#{query}%"
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            

            

            
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            

            

                  # 
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            

            

                  base_query = GiftRecord.where(is_public: true)
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            

            

            
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            

            

                  # 
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            

            

                  item_results = base_query
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            

            

                    .includes(:gift_person, :user, gift_person: :relationship)
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            

            

                    .where("gift_records.item_name ILIKE ?", search_term)
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            

            

                    .limit(AUTOCOMPLETE_ITEM_LIMIT)
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            

            

                    .map do |record|
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            

            

                      {
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            

            

                        id: record.id,
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            

            

                        item_name: record.item_name,
          
      205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    205. 
            

            

                        type: "item",
          
      206. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    206. 
            

            

                        display_text: record.item_name,
          
      207. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    207. 
            

            

                        input_text: record.item_name,
          
      208. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    208. 
            

            

                        search_highlight: highlight_match(record.item_name, query)
          
      209. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    209. 
            

            

                      }
          
      210. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    210. 
            

            

                    end
          
      211. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    211. 
            

            

            
          
      212. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    212. 
            

            

                  # 
          
      213. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    213. 
            

            

                  memo_results = base_query
          
      214. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    214. 
            

            

                    .includes(:gift_person, :user, gift_person: :relationship)
          
      215. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    215. 
            

            

                    .where.not(memo: [ nil, "" ])
          
      216. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    216. 
            

            

                    .where("gift_records.memo ILIKE ?", search_term)
          
      217. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    217. 
            

            

                    .limit(AUTOCOMPLETE_MEMO_LIMIT)
          
      218. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    218. 
            

            

                    .map do |record|
          
      219. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    219. 
            

            

                      {
          
      220. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    220. 
            

            

                        id: record.id,
          
      221. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    221. 
            

            

                        item_name: record.item_name,
          
      222. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    222. 
            

            

                        type: "memo",
          
      223. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    223. 
            

            

                        display_text: "#{truncate_text(record.memo, MEMO_AUTOCOMPLETE_TRUNCATE_LENGTH)}",
          
      224. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    224. 
            

            

                        input_text: record.memo.to_s,
          
      225. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    225. 
            

            

                        search_highlight: highlight_match(record.memo, query)
          
      226. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    226. 
            

            

                      }
          
      227. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    227. 
            

            

                    end
          
      228. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    228. 
            

            

            
          
      229. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    229. 
            

            

                  results = (item_results + memo_results).uniq { |item| item[:id] }.take(AUTOCOMPLETE_RESULT_LIMIT)
          
      230. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    230. 
            

            

            
          
      231. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    231. 
            

            

                  render json: {
          
      232. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    232. 
            

            

                    results: results,
          
      233. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    233. 
            

            

                    total_count: results.length
          
      234. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    234. 
            

            

                  }
          
      235. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    235. 
            

            

                else
          
      236. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    236. 
            

            

                  render json: {
          
      237. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    237. 
            

            

                    results: [],
          
      238. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    238. 
            

            

                    total_count: 0
          
      239. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    239. 
            

            

                  }
          
      240. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    240. 
            

            

                end
          
      241. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    241. 
            

            

            
          
      242. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    242. 
            

            

              rescue StandardError => e
          
      243. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    243. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.error "GiftRecords autocomplete error: #{e.message}"
          
      244. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    244. 
            

            

                render json: {
          
      245. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    245. 
            

            

                  results: [],
          
      246. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    246. 
            

            

                  total_count: 0,
          
      247. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    247. 
            

            

                  error: ""
          
      248. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    248. 
            

            

                }, status: :internal_server_error
          
      249. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    249. 
            

            

              end
          
      250. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    250. 
            

            

            
          
      251. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    251. 
            

            

              # 
          
      252. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    252. 
            

            

              def dismiss_share
          
      253. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    253. 
            

            

                unless user_signed_in?
          
      254. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    254. 
            

            

                  render json: { success: false, error: "Authentication required" }, status: :unauthorized
          
      255. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    255. 
            

            

                  return
          
      256. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    256. 
            

            

                end
          
      257. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    257. 
            

            

            
          
      258. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    258. 
            

            

                gift_record_id = params[:gift_record_id]
          
      259. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    259. 
            

            

            
          
      260. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    260. 
            

            

                if gift_record_id.present?
          
      261. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    261. 
            

            

                  # 
          
      262. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    262. 
            

            

                  gift_record = current_user.gift_records.find_by(id: gift_record_id)
          
      263. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    263. 
            

            

                  unless gift_record
          
      264. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    264. 
            

            

                    render json: { success: false, error: "Gift record not found" }, status: :not_found
          
      265. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    265. 
            

            

                    return
          
      266. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    266. 
            

            

                  end
          
      267. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    267. 
            

            

            
          
      268. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    268. 
            

            

                  # ID
          
      269. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    269. 
            

            

                  session[:dismissed_share_records] ||= []
          
      270. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    270. 
            

            

                  session[:dismissed_share_records] << gift_record_id.to_s
          
      271. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    271. 
            

            

                  session[:dismissed_share_records].uniq!
          
      272. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    272. 
            

            

            
          
      273. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    273. 
            

            

                  render json: { success: true }
          
      274. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    274. 
            

            

                else
          
      275. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    275. 
            

            

                  render json: { success: false, error: "Invalid gift record ID" }, status: :bad_request
          
      276. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    276. 
            

            

                end
          
      277. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    277. 
            

            

              rescue StandardError => e
          
      278. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    278. 
            

            

                render json: { success: false, error: "Internal server error" }, status: :internal_server_error
          
      279. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    279. 
            

            

              end
          
      280. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    280. 
            

            

            
          
      281. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    281. 
            

            

            
          
      282. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    282. 
            

            

              private
          
      283. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    283. 
            

            

            
          
      284. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    284. 
            

            

              def build_base_query
          
      285. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    285. 
            

            

                GiftRecord.where(is_public: true)
          
      286. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    286. 
            

            

                  .includes(:gift_person, :event, :user, gift_person: :relationship, images_attachments: :blob)
          
      287. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    287. 
            

            

              end
          
      288. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    288. 
            

            

            
          
      289. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    289. 
            

            

              def apply_search_and_filters(base_query)
          
      290. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    290. 
            

            

                result = base_query
          
      291. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    291. 
            

            

            
          
      292. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    292. 
            

            

                # 
          
      293. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    293. 
            

            

                if params[:search].present?
          
      294. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    294. 
            

            

                  search_term = "%#{params[:search]}%"
          
      295. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    295. 
            

            

                  result = result.joins(:gift_person)
          
      296. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    296. 
            

            

                    .where(
          
      297. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    297. 
            

            

                      "gift_records.item_name ILIKE ? OR gift_records.memo ILIKE ? OR gift_people.name ILIKE ?",
          
      298. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    298. 
            

            

                      search_term, search_term, search_term
          
      299. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    299. 
            

            

                    )
          
      300. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    300. 
            

            

                end
          
      301. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    301. 
            

            

            
          
      302. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    302. 
            

            

                # 
          
      303. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    303. 
            

            

                result = apply_filters(result)
          
      304. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    304. 
            

            

                result
          
      305. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    305. 
            

            

              end
          
      306. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    306. 
            

            

            
          
      307. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    307. 
            

            

              def apply_filters(query)
          
      308. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    308. 
            

            

                query = query.where(gift_people_id: params[:gift_person_id]) if params[:gift_person_id].present?
          
      309. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    309. 
            

            

            
          
      310. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    310. 
            

            

                if params[:relationship_id].present?
          
      311. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    311. 
            

            

                  query = query.joins(:gift_person).where(gift_people: { relationship_id: params[:relationship_id] })
          
      312. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    312. 
            

            

                end
          
      313. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    313. 
            

            

            
          
      314. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    314. 
            

            

                # 
          
      315. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    315. 
            

            

                if params[:age_group].present?
          
      316. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    316. 
            

            

                  from, to = birthday_range_for(params[:age_group])
          
      317. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    317. 
            

            

                  query = query.joins(:gift_person)
          
      318. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    318. 
            

            

                  if from && to
          
      319. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    319. 
            

            

                    query = query.where(gift_people: { birthday: from..to })
          
      320. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    320. 
            

            

                  elsif to
          
      321. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    321. 
            

            

                    query = query.where("gift_people.birthday <= ?", to)
          
      322. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    322. 
            

            

                  end
          
      323. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    323. 
            

            

                end
          
      324. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    324. 
            

            

            
          
      325. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    325. 
            

            

                # 
          
      326. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    326. 
            

            

                if params[:gender].present?
          
      327. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    327. 
            

            

                  gender_relationship_ids = Relationship.ids_for_gender(params[:gender])
          
      328. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    328. 
            

            

                  query = query.joins(:gift_person).where(gift_people: { relationship_id: gender_relationship_ids })
          
      329. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    329. 
            

            

                end
          
      330. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    330. 
            

            

            
          
      331. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    331. 
            

            

                query = query.where(event_id: params[:event_id]) if params[:event_id].present?
          
      332. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    332. 
            

            

                query = query.where(gift_item_category_id: params[:gift_item_category_id]) if params[:gift_item_category_id].present?
          
      333. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    333. 
            

            

                # my_index 
          
      334. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    334. 
            

            

                if params[:is_public].present?
          
      335. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    335. 
            

            

                  case params[:is_public]
          
      336. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    336. 
            

            

                  when "public"
          
      337. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    337. 
            

            

                    query = query.where(is_public: true)
          
      338. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    338. 
            

            

                  when "private"
          
      339. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    339. 
            

            

                    query = query.where(is_public: false)
          
      340. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    340. 
            

            

                  end
          
      341. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    341. 
            

            

                end
          
      342. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    342. 
            

            

            
          
      343. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    343. 
            

            

                if params[:gift_direction].present?
          
      344. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    344. 
            

            

                  case params[:gift_direction]
          
      345. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    345. 
            

            

                  when GIVEN_DIRECTION, RECEIVED_DIRECTION
          
      346. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    346. 
            

            

                    query = query.where(gift_direction: params[:gift_direction])
          
      347. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    347. 
            

            

                  end
          
      348. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    348. 
            

            

                end
          
      349. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    349. 
            

            

                query = query.where("gift_at >= ?", params[:date_from]) if params[:date_from].present?
          
      350. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    350. 
            

            

                query = query.where("gift_at <= ?", params[:date_to]) if params[:date_to].present?
          
      351. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    351. 
            

            

            
          
      352. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    352. 
            

            

                query
          
      353. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    353. 
            

            

              end
          
      354. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    354. 
            

            

            
          
      355. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    355. 
            

            

              def calculate_statistics(base_query)
          
      356. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    356. 
            

            

                @total_records = @gift_records.count
          
      357. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    357. 
            

            

                @current_month_records = base_query.where(
          
      358. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    358. 
            

            

                  "gift_records.gift_at" => Date.current.beginning_of_month..Date.current.end_of_month
          
      359. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    359. 
            

            

                ).count
          
      360. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    360. 
            

            

              end
          
      361. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    361. 
            

            

            
          
      362. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    362. 
            

            

              def per_page_count
          
      363. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    363. 
            

            

                @per_page_count ||= if request.user_agent =~ /Mobile|Android|iPhone|iPad/
          
      364. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    364. 
            

            

                  PER_PAGE_MOBILE
          
      365. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    365. 
            

            

                else
          
      366. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    366. 
            

            

                  PER_PAGE_DESKTOP
          
      367. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    367. 
            

            

                end
          
      368. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    368. 
            

            

              end
          
      369. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    369. 
            

            

            
          
      370. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    370. 
            

            

              def apply_sorting_and_pagination
          
      371. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    371. 
            

            

                sort_by = params[:sort_by].presence
          
      372. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    372. 
            

            

                sort_order = params[:sort_order].presence == "asc" ? "asc" : "desc"
          
      373. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    373. 
            

            

            
          
      374. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    374. 
            

            

                case sort_by
          
      375. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    375. 
            

            

                when "favorites"
          
      376. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    376. 
            

            

                  apply_favorites_sorting(sort_order)
          
      377. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    377. 
            

            

                when "created_at"
          
      378. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    378. 
            

            

                  @gift_records = @gift_records.order("gift_records.created_at #{sort_order}")
          
      379. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    379. 
            

            

                    .page(params[:page]).per(per_page_count)
          
      380. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    380. 
            

            

                else
          
      381. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    381. 
            

            

                  @gift_records = @gift_records.order(created_at: :desc)
          
      382. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    382. 
            

            

                    .page(params[:page]).per(per_page_count)
          
      383. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    383. 
            

            

                end
          
      384. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    384. 
            

            

              end
          
      385. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    385. 
            

            

            
          
      386. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    386. 
            

            

              def apply_favorites_sorting(sort_order)
          
      387. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    387. 
            

            

                all_record_ids = @gift_records.pluck(:id)
          
      388. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    388. 
            

            

            
          
      389. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    389. 
            

            

                if all_record_ids.empty?
          
      390. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    390. 
            

            

                  @gift_records = @gift_records.page(params[:page]).per(per_page_count)
          
      391. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    391. 
            

            

                  return
          
      392. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    392. 
            

            

                end
          
      393. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    393. 
            

            

            
          
      394. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    394. 
            

            

                # 
          
      395. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    395. 
            

            

                favorites_counts = Favorite
          
      396. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    396. 
            

            

                  .where(gift_record_id: all_record_ids)
          
      397. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    397. 
            

            

                  .group(:gift_record_id)
          
      398. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    398. 
            

            

                  .count
          
      399. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    399. 
            

            

            
          
      400. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    400. 
            

            

                # 
          
      401.
