    401. 
            

            

                sorted_ids = all_record_ids.sort_by do |id|
          
      402. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    402. 
            

            

                  count = favorites_counts[id] || 0
          
      403. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    403. 
            

            

                  sort_order == "desc" ? -count : count
          
      404. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    404. 
            

            

                end
          
      405. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    405. 
            

            

            
          
      406. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    406. 
            

            

                # 
          
      407. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    407. 
            

            

                validated_ids = sorted_ids.select { |id| id.is_a?(Integer) && id > 0 }
          
      408. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    408. 
            

            

            
          
      409. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    409. 
            

            

                if validated_ids.any?
          
      410. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    410. 
            

            

                  paginate_sorted_records(validated_ids)
          
      411. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    411. 
            

            

                else
          
      412. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    412. 
            

            

                  @gift_records = @gift_records.none.page(params[:page]).per(per_page_count)
          
      413. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    413. 
            

            

                end
          
      414. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    414. 
            

            

              end
          
      415. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    415. 
            

            

            
          
      416. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    416. 
            

            

              def paginate_sorted_records(validated_ids)
          
      417. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    417. 
            

            

                paginated_ids = Kaminari.paginate_array(validated_ids)
          
      418. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    418. 
            

            

                  .page(params[:page])
          
      419. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    419. 
            

            

                  .per(per_page_count)
          
      420. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    420. 
            

            

            
          
      421. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    421. 
            

            

                current_page_ids = paginated_ids.to_a
          
      422. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    422. 
            

            

            
          
      423. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    423. 
            

            

                if current_page_ids.any?
          
      424. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    424. 
            

            

                  records_hash = @gift_records.where(id: current_page_ids).index_by(&:id)
          
      425. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    425. 
            

            

                  sorted_records = current_page_ids.filter_map { |id| records_hash[id] }
          
      426. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    426. 
            

            

            
          
      427. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    427. 
            

            

                  @gift_records = Kaminari.paginate_array(
          
      428. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    428. 
            

            

                    sorted_records,
          
      429. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    429. 
            

            

                    total_count: validated_ids.length,
          
      430. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    430. 
            

            

                    limit: per_page_count,
          
      431. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    431. 
            

            

                    offset: paginated_ids.offset_value
          
      432. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    432. 
            

            

                  ).page(params[:page]).per(per_page_count)
          
      433. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    433. 
            

            

                else
          
      434. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    434. 
            

            

                  @gift_records = @gift_records.page(params[:page]).per(per_page_count)
          
      435. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    435. 
            

            

                end
          
      436. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    436. 
            

            

              end
          
      437. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    437. 
            

            

            
          
      438. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    438. 
            

            

              def prepare_share_confirmation_data
          
      439. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    439. 
            

            

                return unless user_signed_in? && params[:share_confirm] == true && params[:gift_record_id].present?
          
      440. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    440. 
            

            

            
          
      441. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    441. 
            

            

                gift_record_id = params[:gift_record_id].to_s
          
      442. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    442. 
            

            

                dismissed_records = session[:dismissed_share_records] || []
          
      443. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    443. 
            

            

            
          
      444. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    444. 
            

            

                unless dismissed_records.include?(gift_record_id)
          
      445. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    445. 
            

            

                  @share_gift_record = current_user.gift_records
          
      446. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    446. 
            

            

                    .includes(:gift_person, :event, gift_person: :relationship)
          
      447. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    447. 
            

            

                    .find_by(id: params[:gift_record_id])
          
      448. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    448. 
            

            

                end
          
      449. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    449. 
            

            

              end
          
      450. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    450. 
            

            

            
          
      451. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    451. 
            

            

              def prepare_pagination_params
          
      452. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    452. 
            

            

                @pagination_params = pagination_params
          
      453. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    453. 
            

            

              end
          
      454. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    454. 
            

            

            
          
      455. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    455. 
            

            

              def gift_record_params
          
      456. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    456. 
            

            

                params.require(:gift_record).permit(
          
      457. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    457. 
            

            

                  :title, :description, :body,
          
      458. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    458. 
            

            

                  :gift_people_id, :memo, :item_name, :amount, :gift_at, :event_id, :is_public, :commentable,
          
      459. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    459. 
            

            

                  :gift_item_category_id, :gift_direction, images: [], delete_image_ids: []
          
      460. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    460. 
            

            

                )
          
      461. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    461. 
            

            

              end
          
      462. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    462. 
            

            

            
          
      463. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    463. 
            

            

              def gift_person_params
          
      464. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    464. 
            

            

                params.require(:gift_person).permit(:name, :relationship_id, :birthday, :likes, :dislikes, :address, :memo)
          
      465. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    465. 
            

            

              end
          
      466. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    466. 
            

            

            
          
      467. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    467. 
            

            

              def gift_person_params_if_present
          
      468. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    468. 
            

            

                return unless params[:gift_person].present?
          
      469. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    469. 
            

            

            
          
      470. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    470. 
            

            

                gift_person_params
          
      471. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    471. 
            

            

              end
          
      472. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    472. 
            

            

            
          
      473. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    473. 
            

            

              # : 
          
      474. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    474. 
            

            

              def set_gift_record
          
      475. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    475. 
            

            

                if action_name == "show"
          
      476. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    476. 
            

            

                  # show 
          
      477. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    477. 
            

            

                  if user_signed_in?
          
      478. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    478. 
            

            

                    @gift_record = GiftRecord.where("gift_records.is_public = ? OR gift_records.user_id = ?", true, current_user.id)
          
      479. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    479. 
            

            

                      .includes(:gift_person, :event, :user, gift_person: :relationship, comments: :user)
          
      480. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    480. 
            

            

                      .find(params[:id])
          
      481. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    481. 
            

            

                  else
          
      482. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    482. 
            

            

                    @gift_record = GiftRecord.where("gift_records.is_public = ?", true)
          
      483. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    483. 
            

            

                      .includes(:gift_person, :event, :user, gift_person: :relationship, comments: :user)
          
      484. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    484. 
            

            

                      .find(params[:id])
          
      485. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    485. 
            

            

                  end
          
      486. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    486. 
            

            

                else
          
      487. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    487. 
            

            

                  # edit, update, destroy 
          
      488. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    488. 
            

            

                  @gift_record = current_user.gift_records
          
      489. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    489. 
            

            

                    .includes(:gift_person, :event, gift_person: :relationship)
          
      490. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    490. 
            

            

                    .find(params[:id])
          
      491. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    491. 
            

            

                end
          
      492. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    492. 
            

            

              rescue ActiveRecord::RecordNotFound
          
      493. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    493. 
            

            

                redirect_to gift_records_path, alert: ""
          
      494. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    494. 
            

            

              end
          
      495. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    495. 
            

            

            
          
      496. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    496. 
            

            

              # : 
          
      497. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    497. 
            

            

              def ensure_owner
          
      498. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    498. 
            

            

                unless @gift_record&.user == current_user
          
      499. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    499. 
            

            

                  redirect_to gift_records_path, alert: ""
          
      500. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    500. 
            

            

                end
          
      501. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    501. 
            

            

              end
          
      502. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    502. 
            

            

            
          
      503. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    503. 
            

            

              # : 
          
      504. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    504. 
            

            

              def ensure_accessible
          
      505. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    505. 
            

            

                return if @gift_record.is_public? || (user_signed_in? && @gift_record.user == current_user)
          
      506. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    506. 
            

            

            
          
      507. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    507. 
            

            

                redirect_to gift_records_path, alert: ""
          
      508. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    508. 
            

            

              end
          
      509. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    509. 
            

            

            
          
      510. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    510. 
            

            

              # 
          
      511. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    511. 
            

            

              def pagination_params
          
      512. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    512. 
            

            

                params.permit(
          
      513. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    513. 
            

            

                  :search,
          
      514. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    514. 
            

            

                  :gift_person_id,
          
      515. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    515. 
            

            

                  :relationship_id,
          
      516. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    516. 
            

            

                  :age_group,
          
      517. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    517. 
            

            

                  :gender,
          
      518. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    518. 
            

            

                  :event_id,
          
      519. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    519. 
            

            

                  :gift_item_category_id,
          
      520. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    520. 
            

            

                  :gift_direction,
          
      521. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    521. 
            

            

                  :date_from,
          
      522. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    522. 
            

            

                  :date_to,
          
      523. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    523. 
            

            

                  :sort_by,
          
      524. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    524. 
            

            

                  :sort_order,
          
      525. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    525. 
            

            

                  :filter_type,
          
      526. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    526. 
            

            

                  :filter_value,
          
      527. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    527. 
            

            

                  :page,
          
      528. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    528. 
            

            

                  :origin
          
      529. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    529. 
            

            

                ).to_h
          
      530. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    530. 
            

            

              end
          
      531. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    531. 
            

            

            
          
      532. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    532. 
            

            

              # 
          
      533. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    533. 
            

            

              def prepare_events_for_form
          
      534. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    534. 
            

            

                # /position
          
      535. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    535. 
            

            

                @events = Event.ordered
          
      536. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    536. 
            

            

                @popular_events = Event.joins(:gift_records)
          
      537. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    537. 
            

            

                  .group("events.id")
          
      538. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    538. 
            

            

                  .order("COUNT(gift_records.id) DESC")
          
      539. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    539. 
            

            

                  .limit(POPULAR_EVENTS_LIMIT)
          
      540. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    540. 
            

            

              end
          
      541. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    541. 
            

            

            
          
      542. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    542. 
            

            

              def handle_gift_record_submission(force_direction: nil, default_direction: nil, template: nil)
          
      543. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    543. 
            

            

                form = GiftRecordForm.new(
          
      544. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    544. 
            

            

                  user: current_user,
          
      545. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    545. 
            

            

                  gift_record_params: gift_record_params,
          
      546. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    546. 
            

            

                  gift_person_params: gift_person_params_if_present,
          
      547. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    547. 
            

            

                  gift_direction_default: default_direction || gift_direction_default_from_session,
          
      548. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    548. 
            

            

                  forced_gift_direction: force_direction
          
      549. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    549. 
            

            

                )
          
      550. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    550. 
            

            

            
          
      551. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    551. 
            

            

                @gift_record = form.gift_record
          
      552. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    552. 
            

            

                @gift_person = form.gift_person
          
      553. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    553. 
            

            

            
          
      554. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    554. 
            

            

                if form.save
          
      555. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    555. 
            

            

                  flash_success(:created, item: GiftRecord.model_name.human)
          
      556. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    556. 
            

            

                  redirect_to gift_records_path(share_confirm: true, gift_record_id: @gift_record.id)
          
      557. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    557. 
            

            

                else
          
      558. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    558. 
            

            

                  flash.now[:alert] = "" if @gift_record.errors.any?
          
      559. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    559. 
            

            

                  prepare_form_dependencies
          
      560. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    560. 
            

            

                  render(template || form_template_for(@gift_record), status: :unprocessable_entity)
          
      561. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    561. 
            

            

                end
          
      562. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    562. 
            

            

              end
          
      563. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    563. 
            

            

            
          
      564. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    564. 
            

            

              def prepare_form_dependencies
          
      565. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    565. 
            

            

                @gift_people = current_user.gift_people.where.not(name: [ nil, "" ])
          
      566. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    566. 
            

            

                prepare_events_for_form
          
      567. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    567. 
            

            

              end
          
      568. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    568. 
            

            

            
          
      569. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    569. 
            

            

              def form_template_for(record)
          
      570. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    570. 
            

            

                record&.received? ? :new_received : :new
          
      571. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    571. 
            

            

              end
          
      572. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    572. 
            

            

            
          
      573. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    573. 
            

            

              def gift_direction_default_from_session
          
      574. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    574. 
            

            

                direction = session[:gift_direction_default]
          
      575. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    575. 
            

            

                direction = direction.to_sym if direction.present?
          
      576. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    576. 
            

            

                %i[given received].include?(direction) ? direction : :given
          
      577. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    577. 
            

            

              end
          
      578. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    578. 
            

            

            
          
      579. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    579. 
            

            

              # 
          
      580. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    580. 
            

            

              def highlight_match(text, query)
          
      581. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    581. 
            

            

                return text unless text.present? && query.present?
          
      582. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    582. 
            

            

            
          
      583. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    583. 
            

            

                text.gsub(Regexp.new(Regexp.escape(query), Regexp::IGNORECASE)) do |match|
          
      584. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    584. 
            

            

                  "<mark>#{match}</mark>"
          
      585. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    585. 
            

            

                end
          
      586. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    586. 
            

            

              rescue StandardError
          
      587. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    587. 
            

            

                text
          
      588. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    588. 
            

            

              end
          
      589. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    589. 
            

            

            
          
      590. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    590. 
            

            

              def truncate_text(text, length = DEFAULT_TRUNCATE_LENGTH)
          
      591. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    591. 
            

            

                return "" unless text.present?
          
      592. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    592. 
            

            

            
          
      593. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    593. 
            

            

                text.length > length ? "#{text[0..length-1]}..." : text
          
      594. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    594. 
            

            

              end
          
      595. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    595. 
            

            

            
          
      596. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    596. 
            

            

            private
          
      597. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    597. 
            

            

            
          
      598. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    598. 
            

            

            def setup_meta_tags
          
      599. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    599. 
            

            

                item_name = @gift_record.item_name.presence || DEFAULT_ITEM_NAME
          
      600. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    600. 
            

            

                description = "#{item_name}#{META_DESCRIPTION_SUFFIX}"
          
      601. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    601. 
            

            

                title =  "#{item_name}#{META_TITLE_SUFFIX}"
          
      602. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    602. 
            

            

            
          
      603. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    603. 
            

            

                set_meta_tags(
          
      604. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    604. 
            

            

                  title: title,
          
      605. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    605. 
            

            

                  description: description,
          
      606. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    606. 
            

            

                  og: {
          
      607. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    607. 
            

            

                    title: title,
          
      608. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    608. 
            

            

                    description: description,
          
      609. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    609. 
            

            

                    image: gift_record_image_url(@gift_record),
          
      610. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    610. 
            

            

                    url: request.original_url,
          
      611. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    611. 
            

            

                    type: "article"
          
      612. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    612. 
            

            

                  },
          
      613. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    613. 
            

            

                  twitter: {
          
      614. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    614. 
            

            

                    card: "summary_large_image",
          
      615. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    615. 
            

            

                    title: title,
          
      616. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    616. 
            

            

                    description: description,
          
      617. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    617. 
            

            

                    image: gift_record_image_url(@gift_record)
          
      618. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    618. 
            

            

                  }
          
      619. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    619. 
            

            

                )
          
      620. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    620. 
            

            

              end
          
      621. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    621. 
            

            

            
          
      622. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    622. 
            

            

            def gift_record_image_url(gift_record)
          
      623. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    623. 
            

            

              Rails.logger.info "=== gift_record_image_url Debug ==="
          
      624. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    624. 
            

            

              Rails.logger.info "gift_record: #{gift_record.inspect}"
          
      625. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    625. 
            

            

            
          
      626. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    626. 
            

            

              return view_context.image_url(DEFAULT_GIFT_IMAGE) if gift_record.nil?
          
      627. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    627. 
            

            

            
          
      628. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    628. 
            

            

              gift_record.ogp_image_url(request)
          
      629. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    629. 
            

            

            rescue => e
          
      630. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    630. 
            

            

              Rails.logger.error "Error generating gift record image URL: #{e.class} - #{e.message}"
          
      631. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    631. 
            

            

              Rails.logger.error e.backtrace.first(LOG_BACKTRACE_LINES).join("\n")
          
      632. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    632. 
            

            

              view_context.image_url(DEFAULT_GIFT_IMAGE)
          
      633. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    633. 
            

            

            end
          
      634. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    634. 
            

            

            
          
      635. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    635. 
            

            

            
          
      636. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    636. 
            

            

            def generate_ogp_image_url(gift_record)
          
      637. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    637. 
            

            

              return default_ogp_image_url unless gift_record&.item_name.present?
          
      638. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    638. 
            

            

            
          
      639. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    639. 
            

            

              begin
          
      640. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    640. 
            

            

                "#{request.base_url}/images/#{DEFAULT_OGP_IMAGE}?text=#{CGI.escape(gift_record.item_name)}"
          
      641. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    641. 
            

            

              rescue => e
          
      642. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    642. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.error "OGP URL: #{e.message}"
          
      643. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    643. 
            

            

                default_ogp_image_url
          
      644. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    644. 
            

            

              end
          
      645. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    645. 
            

            

            end
          
      646. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    646. 
            

            

            
          
      647. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    647. 
            

            

            def build_page_title(gift_record)
          
      648. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    648. 
            

            

              item_name = gift_record.item_name.presence || DEFAULT_ITEM_NAME
          
      649. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    649. 
            

            

              "#{item_name}#{META_TITLE_SUFFIX}"
          
      650. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    650. 
            

            

            end
          
      651. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    651. 
            

            

            
          
      652. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    652. 
            

            

            def build_page_description(gift_record)
          
      653. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    653. 
            

            

              name = gift_record.item_name.presence || DEFAULT_ITEM_NAME
          
      654. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    654. 
            

            

              base_description = "#{name}#{META_DESCRIPTION_SUFFIX}"
          
      655. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    655. 
            

            

            
          
      656. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    656. 
            

            

              if gift_record.item_name.present?
          
      657. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    657. 
            

            

                base_description = "#{gift_record.item_name}#{base_description}"
          
      658. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    658. 
            

            

                base_description += " #{gift_record.item_name.truncate(META_DESCRIPTION_TRUNCATE_LENGTH)}"
          
      659. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    659. 
            

            

              end
          
      660. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    660. 
            

            

            
          
      661. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    661. 
            

            

              base_description
          
      662. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    662. 
            

            

            end
          
      663. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    663. 
            

            

            
          
      664. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    664. 
            

            

              def build_keywords(gift_record)
          
      665. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    665. 
            

            

                keywords = BASE_KEYWORDS.dup
          
      666. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    666. 
            

            

                keywords << gift_record.item_name if gift_record.item_name.present?
          
      667. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    667. 
            

            

                keywords.join(",")
          
      668. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    668. 
            

            

              end
          
      669. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    669. 
            

            

            
          
      670. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    670. 
            

            

              def default_ogp_image_url
          
      671. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    671. 
            

            

                url = "#{request.base_url}#{image_path(DEFAULT_OGP_IMAGE)}"
          
      672. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    672. 
            

            

                Rails.env.production? ? url.sub(%r{^http://}, "https://") : url
          
      673. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    673. 
            

            

              end
          
      674. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    674. 
            

            

            
          
      675. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    675. 
            

            

              def prepare_filter_options(base_query)
          
      676. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    676. 
            

            

                @relationship_options = build_relationship_options(base_query)
          
      677. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    677. 
            

            

                @event_options = build_event_options(base_query)
          
      678. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    678. 
            

            

                @gift_item_category_options = build_gift_item_category_options(base_query)
          
      679. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    679. 
            

            

                @gift_direction_options = [
          
      680. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    680. 
            

            

                  [ "", "" ],
          
      681. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    681. 
            

            

                  [ "", GIVEN_DIRECTION ],
          
      682. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    682. 
            

            

                  [ "", RECEIVED_DIRECTION ]
          
      683. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    683. 
            

            

                ]
          
      684. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    684. 
            

            

              end
          
      685. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    685. 
            

            

            
          
      686. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    686. 
            

            

              def build_relationship_options(base_query)
          
      687. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    687. 
            

            

                # IDposition
          
      688. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    688. 
            

            

                relationship_ids = base_query
          
      689. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    689. 
            

            

                  .joins(gift_person: :relationship)
          
      690. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    690. 
            

            

                  .select("DISTINCT gift_people.relationship_id")
          
      691. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    691. 
            

            

            
          
      692. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    692. 
            

            

                Relationship.where(id: relationship_ids)
          
      693. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    693. 
            

            

                  .ordered
          
      694. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    694. 
            

            

                  .pluck(:name, :id)
          
      695. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    695. 
            

            

              end
          
      696. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    696. 
            

            

            
          
      697. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    697. 
            

            

              def build_event_options(base_query)
          
      698. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    698. 
            

            

                # IDposition
          
      699. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    699. 
            

            

                event_ids = base_query
          
      700. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    700. 
            

            

                  .joins(:event)
          
      701. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    701. 
            

            

                  .select("DISTINCT gift_records.event_id")
          
      702. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    702. 
            

            

            
          
      703. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    703. 
            

            

                Event.where(id: event_ids)
          
      704. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    704. 
            

            

                  .order(:position)
          
      705. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    705. 
            

            

                  .pluck(:name, :id)
          
      706. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    706. 
            

            

              end
          
      707. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    707. 
            

            

            
          
      708. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    708. 
            

            

              def build_gift_item_category_options(base_query)
          
      709. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    709. 
            

            

                # IDposition
          
      710. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    710. 
            

            

                category_ids = base_query
          
      711. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    711. 
            

            

                  .select("DISTINCT gift_records.gift_item_category_id")
          
      712. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    712. 
            

            

            
          
      713. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    713. 
            

            

                GiftItemCategory.where(id: category_ids)
          
      714. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    714. 
            

            

                  .ordered
          
      715. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    715. 
            

            

                  .pluck(:name, :id)
          
      716. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    716. 
            

            

              end
          
      717. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    717. 
            

            

            
          
      718. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    718. 
            

            

              def apply_search_and_filters_for_user(base_query)
          
      719. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    719. 
            

            

                result = base_query
          
      720. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    720. 
            

            

                  .includes(:gift_person, :event, :user, gift_person: :relationship, images_attachments: :blob)
          
      721. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    721. 
            

            

            
          
      722. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    722. 
            

            

                # 
          
      723. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    723. 
            

            

                if params[:search].present?
          
      724. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    724. 
            

            

                  search_term = "%#{params[:search]}%"
          
      725. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    725. 
            

            

                  result = result.joins(:gift_person)
          
      726. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    726. 
            

            

                    .where(
          
      727. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    727. 
            

            

                      "gift_records.item_name ILIKE ? OR gift_records.memo ILIKE ? OR gift_people.name ILIKE ?",
          
      728. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    728. 
            

            

                      search_term, search_term, search_term
          
      729. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    729. 
            

            

                    )
          
      730. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    730. 
            

            

                end
          
      731. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    731. 
            

            

            
          
      732. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    732. 
            

            

                # 
          
      733. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    733. 
            

            

                result = apply_filters(result)
          
      734. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    734. 
            

            

                result
          
      735. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    735. 
            

            

              end
          
      736. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    736. 
            

            

            
          
      737. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    737. 
            

            

              def calculate_user_statistics(base_query)
          
      738. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    738. 
            

            

                @total_records = @gift_records.count
          
      739. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    739. 
            

            

                @current_month_records = base_query.where(
          
      740. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    740. 
            

            

                  "gift_records.gift_at" => Date.current.beginning_of_month..Date.current.end_of_month
          
      741. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    741. 
            

            

                ).count
          
      742. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    742. 
            

            

                @public_records_count = base_query.where(is_public: true).count
          
      743. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    743. 
            

            

                @private_records_count = base_query.where(is_public: false).count
          
      744. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    744. 
            

            

              end
          
      745. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    745. 
            

            

            
          
      746. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    746. 
            

            

              def prepare_user_filter_options(base_query)
          
      747. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    747. 
            

            

                @gift_people_options = build_user_gift_people_options(base_query)
          
      748. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    748. 
            

            

                @relationship_options = build_relationship_options(base_query)
          
      749. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    749. 
            

            

                @event_options = build_event_options(base_query)
          
      750. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    750. 
            

            

                @gift_item_category_options = build_gift_item_category_options(base_query)
          
      751. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    751. 
            

            

                @gift_direction_options = [
          
      752. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    752. 
            

            

                  [ "", "" ],
          
      753. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    753. 
            

            

                  [ "", GIVEN_DIRECTION ],
          
      754. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    754. 
            

            

                  [ "", RECEIVED_DIRECTION ]
          
      755. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    755. 
            

            

                ]
          
      756. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    756. 
            

            

              end
          
      757. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    757. 
            

            

            
          
      758. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    758. 
            

            

              def build_user_gift_people_options(base_query)
          
      759. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    759. 
            

            

                base_query
          
      760. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    760. 
            

            

                  .joins(:gift_person)
          
      761. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    761. 
            

            

                  .group("gift_people.id, gift_people.name")
          
      762. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    762. 
            

            

                  .where.not("gift_people.name" => [ nil, "" ])
          
      763. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    763. 
            

            

                  .order("gift_people.name")
          
      764. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    764. 
            

            

                  .pluck("gift_people.name", "gift_people.id")
          
      765. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    765. 
            

            

              end
          
      766. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    766. 
            

            

            end
          
      767.

              def sanitize_text(text)
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                # 
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                return DEFAULT_TEXT if text.blank?

    37. 
            

            

            
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38.

    39. 
            

            

                sanitized = text.to_s.gsub(/[\r\n\t]/, " ").strip
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                sanitized.length > MAX_TEXT_LENGTH ? sanitized[0...MAX_TEXT_LENGTH] + TRUNCATED_SUFFIX : sanitized

      42.

              def generate_etag(text)
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                Digest::MD5.hexdigest("ogp_#{text}_#{ETAG_VERSION}")
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

              end
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

            
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

              def render_ogp_image(text, etag)
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                cache_key = "ogp_image_#{etag}"
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

            
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                image_data = Rails.cache.fetch(cache_key, expires_in: OGP_CACHE_TTL) do
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                  generate_ogp_image(text)
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                end
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

            
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                if image_data
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                  response.headers["Cache-Control"] = CACHE_CONTROL_HEADER
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                  response.headers["ETag"] = etag
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

            
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58.

      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59.

      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60.

      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                end
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

              rescue => e
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63.

      64.

              def generate_ogp_image(text)

              rescue => e

              def send_default_ogp_image

    75. 
            

            

                # Prefer explicit default, fallback to base OGP image

      77.

      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81.

              end

              def create

                if @remind.save

              def resend

                @remind.update!(is_sent: false)

              private

              def display_avatar(record, size = :medium)
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                return nil unless record&.respond_to?(:avatar)
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                avatar = record.avatar
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                return nil unless avatar&.attached? && avatar&.blob&.persisted? && record.respond_to?(:persisted?) && record.persisted?
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

            
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                begin
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                  case size
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                  when :small
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                    avatar.variant(resize_to_fill: [ 40, 40 ])
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                  when :medium
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                    avatar.variant(resize_to_fill: [ 80, 80 ])
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                  when :large
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                    avatar.variant(resize_to_fill: [ 160, 160 ])
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                  else
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                    avatar
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                  end
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                rescue ActiveRecord::RecordNotFound, NoMethodError, ArgumentError => e
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.warn "Avatar variant generation failed: #{e.message}"
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                  nil
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                end
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

              end
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

            
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67.

              def gift_direction_color(record_or_value)
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98.

                case dir
          
      100.

                when :received then "#FF6B6B"

              def gift_direction_value(record_or_value)

              def default_gift_direction_checked?(record_or_value, target)
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            

                extract_gift_direction(record_or_value) == extract_gift_direction(target)
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            

              end
          
      143.

              private
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            

            
          
      146.

              # :given/:received 
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            

              def extract_gift_direction(record_or_value)
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            

                value = if record_or_value.respond_to?(:gift_direction)
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            

                          record_or_value.gift_direction
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            

                else
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            

                          record_or_value
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            

                end
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            

            
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            

                case value
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            

                when :given, "given", 0 then :given
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            

                when :received, "received", 1 then :received
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            

                else nil
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            

                end
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            

              end
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            

            end
          
      161.

              def gift_person_display_name(gift_person)

                return "" unless gift_person&.name.present?

      7.

              def gift_person_age(gift_person)
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                return nil unless gift_person&.birthday.present?
          
      16.

              def days_until_birthday(gift_person)
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                return nil unless gift_person&.birthday.present?
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                today = Date.current
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                this_year_birthday = Date.new(today.year, gift_person.birthday.month, gift_person.birthday.day)
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                next_birthday = this_year_birthday < today ? this_year_birthday.next_year : this_year_birthday
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                (next_birthday - today).to_i
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

              end
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

            
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28.

              def gift_person_stats(gift_person, user)
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                gift_records = user.gift_records.where(gift_people_id: gift_person.id)
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                {
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                  total_gifts: gift_records.count,
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                  last_gift_date: gift_records.maximum(:gift_at),
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                  first_gift_date: gift_records.minimum(:gift_at)
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                }
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

              end

              def gift_person_status_badge(gift_person, user)
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                stats = gift_person_stats(gift_person, user)
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                if stats[:total_gifts] == 0
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                  content_tag :span, "", class: "inline-flex items-center px-2.5 py-0.5 rounded-full text-xs font-medium bg-gray-100 text-gray-800"
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                elsif stats[:last_gift_date] && stats[:last_gift_date] > 1.month.ago
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                  content_tag :span, "", class: "inline-flex items-center px-2.5 py-0.5 rounded-full text-xs font-medium bg-green-100 text-green-800"

    45.

              def gift_image_with_fallback(attachment, size:, alt:, css_class: "", loading: "lazy")
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

                begin
          
      4.

                  if attachment&.blob&.persisted?

      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

                              class: css_class,
          
      7.

      9.

    10.

      12.

                rescue => e

    app/jobs/application_job.rb

            class ApplicationJob < ActiveJob::Base
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            

              # Automatically retry jobs that encountered a deadlock
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

              # retry_on ActiveRecord::Deadlocked
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

            
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

              # Most jobs are safe to ignore if the underlying records are no longer available
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

              # discard_on ActiveJob::DeserializationError
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7.

    app/jobs/convert_attachments_to_webp_job.rb

    0.0% lines covered

    36 relevant lines. 0 lines covered and 36 lines missed. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1. 
            

            

            class ConvertAttachmentsToWebpJob < ApplicationJob
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            

              queue_as :default
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            

            

            
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

              # (avatar/images )WebP
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

              # attachment_names: String  Array<String>
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

              def perform(record_class, record_id, attachment_names)
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

                names = Array(attachment_names).map(&:to_s)
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

                record = safe_find(record_class, record_id)
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                return unless record
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

            
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                names.each do |name|
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                  attachable = fetch_attachable(record, name)
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                  next unless attachable
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

            
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                  attachments = collect_attachments(attachable)
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                  attachments.each { |att| WebpConversionService.convert_attachment!(att) }
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                end
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

              rescue => e
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.error "[ConvertAttachmentsToWebpJob] Error: #{e.class} - #{e.message} (#{record_class}##{record_id})"
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

              end
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

            
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

              private
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

            
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

              def safe_find(klass_name, id)
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                klass_name.constantize.find_by(id: id)
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

              rescue NameError
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.error "[ConvertAttachmentsToWebpJob] Unknown class: #{klass_name}"
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                nil
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

              end
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

            
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

              def fetch_attachable(record, name)
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                return nil unless record.respond_to?(name)
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                record.public_send(name)
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

              end
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

            
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

              def collect_attachments(attachable)
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                if attachable.respond_to?(:attachments)
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                  Array(attachable.attachments).compact
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                elsif attachable.respond_to?(:attachment)
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                  [ attachable.attachment ].compact
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                else
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                  []
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                end
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

              end
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

            end

            class ConvertGiftImagesToWebpJob < ApplicationJob
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            

            

              queue_as :default

              def perform(gift_record_id)

      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10.
