              def convert_attachment_to_webp!(attachment)
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                blob = attachment.blob
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                return unless blob.present?
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

            
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                # WebP
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                return unless blob.content_type.to_s.start_with?("image/")
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                return if blob.content_type.to_s == "image/webp" || attachment.filename.to_s.downcase.end_with?(".webp")
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

            
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                original_blob = blob
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30.

    31. 
            

            

                # WebP

      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                  require "mini_magick"
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34.

                  image = MiniMagick::Image.open(file.path)

    36. 
            

            

                  image.auto_orient # EXIF
          
      37.

                  image.strip       # 
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

            
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                  #

    40. 
            

            

                  tmp_out = Tempfile.new([ "gift_record_#{attachment.id}", ".webp" ])

                  tmp_out.binmode
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

            
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                  begin
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                    # 8090

    45.

      47.

      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

            
          
      50.

                    new_blob = nil
          
      52.

      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                      new_blob = ActiveStorage::Blob.create_and_upload!(
          
      54.

              def avatar_url

              def has_avatar?

              def avatar_validation

                unless avatar.content_type.in?(self.class.avatar_content_types)

                  errors.add(:avatar, "JPEGPNGWEBP")
          
      31.

                if avatar.blob.byte_size > self.class.avatar_max_size
          
      34.

                  errors.add(:avatar, "#{self.class.avatar_max_size / 1.megabyte}MB")
          
      35.

              rescue StandardError => e

    29.

              def enqueue_webp_conversion

      31.

              def age_at(reference_date = Date.current)
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                return nil unless birthday.present?
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

            
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                reference_date = reference_date.to_date
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                birthday_date = birthday.to_date
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

            
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                # 0

    29. 
            

            

                return 0 if birthday_date > reference_date

    30. 
            

            

            
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                # 
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                age = reference_date.year - birthday_date.year
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

            
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                # 1
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                if reference_date.month < birthday_date.month ||

    36. 
            

            

                  (reference_date.month == birthday_date.month && reference_date.day < birthday_date.day)
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                  age -= 1
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                end
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

            
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                age

              def display_age_at(reference_date = Date.current)
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                age = age_at(reference_date)
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                return nil unless age
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

            
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                case age
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                when 0
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                  "0"
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51.

      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                  "#{age}"
          
      53.

      54.

              def ogp_image_url(request)

              begin

              def ogp_resized_image

              def handle_first_image_resized(request)
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            

                first_attachment = valid_image_attachments.first

      125.

    129. 
            

            

                    first_attachment.variant(resize_to_limit: [ 1200, 630 ]),
          
      130.

      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131.

    143. 
            

            

              # - URL
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            
              1
            

            

              def handle_suitable_uploaded_image(helpers, request)
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            

                attachment = suitable_ogp_images.first
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            

                return handle_default_image(request) unless attachment
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            

            
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            

                begin
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            

                  variant = attachment.variant(resize_to_limit: [ 1200, 630 ])
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            

                  url = helpers.rails_representation_url(variant.processed, host: request.base_url)
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            

                  url = url.sub(%r{^http://}, "https://") if Rails.env.production?
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "Using suitable uploaded image (variant): #{url}"
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            

                  url
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            

                rescue => e
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.warn "Variant generation failed for suitable image: #{e.message}"
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            

                  begin
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            

                    url = helpers.rails_blob_url(attachment, host: request.base_url)
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            

                    url = url.sub(%r{^http://}, "https://") if Rails.env.production?
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.info "Using suitable uploaded image (original): #{url}"
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            

                    url
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            

                  rescue => e2
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.error "Blob URL generation failed: #{e2.message}"
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            

                    handle_default_image(request)
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            

                  end
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            

                end
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            

              end
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            

            
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            

              # OGP
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            

              # - S3URL
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            
              1
            

            

              def handle_dynamic_text_image(helpers, request)
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            

                ensure_generated_ogp!
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            

                if ogp_image.attached?
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            

                  url = helpers.rails_blob_url(ogp_image, host: request.base_url)
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            

                  url = url.sub(%r{^http://}, "https://") if Rails.env.production?
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            

                  Rails.logger.info "Using dynamically generated OGP image: #{url}"
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            

            

                  url
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            

                else
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            

                  default_ogp_fallback_url(request)
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            

                end
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            

              rescue => e
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.error "Dynamic OGP handling error: #{e.message}"
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            

            

                default_ogp_fallback_url(request)
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            

              end
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            

            

            
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            
              1
            

            

             def handle_default_image(request)
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            

            

              # image_urlURL
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            

            

              helpers = ActionController::Base.helpers
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            

            

            
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            

            

              # URL + 
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            

            

              url = helpers.image_url("ogp.webp", host: request.base_url)
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            

            

            
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            

            

              # HTTPS
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            

            

              url = url.sub(%r{^http://}, "https://") if Rails.env.production?
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            

            

            
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            

            

              Rails.logger.info "Using default OGP image: #{url}"
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            

            

              url
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            

            

            rescue => e
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            

            

              Rails.logger.error "Error getting default image: #{e.message}"
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            

            

              # image_url
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            

            

              fallback_url = helpers.image_url("ogp.webp", host: request.base_url)
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            

            

              fallback_url.sub(%r{^http://}, "https://") if Rails.env.production?
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            

            

              fallback_url
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            

            

            end
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            

            

            
          
      205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    205. 
            

            

              # OGP
          
      206. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    206. 
            
              1
            

            

              def suitable_ogp_images
          
      207. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    207. 
            

            

                @suitable_ogp_images ||= valid_image_attachments.select { |img| image_suitable_for_ogp?(img) }
          
      208. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    208. 
            

            

              end
          
      209. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    209. 
            

            

            
          
      210. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    210. 
            

            

              # OGPS3
          
      211. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    211. 
            
              1
            

            

              def ensure_generated_ogp!
          
      212. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    212. 
            

            

                return if ogp_image.attached?
          
      213. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    213. 
            

            

            
          
      214. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    214. 
            

            

                text = item_name.presence || ""
          
      215. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    215. 
            

            

                image = OgpCreator.build(text)
          
      216. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    216. 
            

            

                tempfile = Tempfile.new([ "ogp_#{id}", ".webp" ])
          
      217. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    217. 
            

            

                tempfile.binmode
          
      218. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    218. 
            

            

                tempfile.write(image.to_blob)
          
      219. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    219. 
            

            

                tempfile.rewind
          
      220. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    220. 
            

            

            
          
      221. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    221. 
            

            

                ogp_image.attach(
          
      222. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    222. 
            

            

                  io: tempfile,
          
      223. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    223. 
            

            

                  filename: "ogp_#{id}.webp",
          
      224. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    224. 
            

            

                  content_type: "image/webp"
          
      225. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    225. 
            

            

                )
          
      226. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    226. 
            

            

            
          
      227. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    227. 
            

            

                image.destroy!
          
      228. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    228. 
            

            

                tempfile.close!
          
      229. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    229. 
            

            

              rescue => e
          
      230. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    230. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.error "OGP/: #{e.message}"
          
      231. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    231. 
            

            

              end
          
      232. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    232. 
            

            

            
          
      233. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    233. 
            
              1
            

            

              def refresh_generated_ogp_image
          
      234. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    234. 
            

            

                return unless ogp_strategy == :generate_dynamic_text_image
          
      235. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    235. 
            

            

            
          
      236. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    236. 
            

            

                ogp_image.purge if ogp_image.attached?
          
      237. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    237. 
            

            

                ensure_generated_ogp!
          
      238. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    238. 
            

            

              rescue => e
          
      239. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    239. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.error "OGP: #{e.message}"
          
      240. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    240. 
            

            

              end
          
      241. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    241. 
            

            

            
          
      242. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    242. 
            
              1
            

            

              def default_ogp_fallback_url(request)
          
      243. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    243. 
            

            

                OgpUrlService.default_fallback_url(request)
          
      244. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    244. 
            

            

              end
          
      245. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    245. 
            

            

            
          
      246. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    246. 
            

            

            
          
      247. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    247. 
            

            

              # 
          
      248. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    248. 
            
              1
            

            

              scope :recent, -> { order(created_at: :desc) }
          
      249. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    249. 
            
              1
            

            

              scope :by_date_range, ->(from, to) { where(gift_at: from..to) }
          
      250. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    250. 
            
              1
            

            

              scope :by_gift_person, ->(gift_person_id) { where(gift_people_id: gift_person_id) }
          
      251. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    251. 
            
              1
            

            

              scope :with_amount, -> { where.not(amount: nil) }
          
      252. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    252. 
            
              1
            

            

              scope :current_month, -> { where(gift_at: Date.current.beginning_of_month..Date.current.end_of_month) }
          
      253. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    253. 
            
              1
            

            

              scope :current_year, -> { where(gift_at: Date.current.beginning_of_year..Date.current.end_of_year) }
          
      254. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    254. 
            
              1
            

            

              scope :commentable, -> { where(commentable: true) }
          
      255. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    255. 
            
              1
            

            

              scope :comment_disabled, -> { where(commentable: false) }
          
      256. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    256. 
            

            

            
          
      257. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    257. 
            
              1
            

            

              scope :received_gifts, -> { where(gift_direction: :received) }
          
      258. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    258. 
            
              1
            

            

              scope :given_gifts, -> { where(gift_direction: :given) }
          
      259. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    259. 
            
              1
            

            

              scope :return_gifts, -> { where(is_return_gift: true) }
          
      260. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    260. 
            
              1
            

            

              scope :original_gifts, -> { where(is_return_gift: false) }
          
      261. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    261. 
            
              1
            

            

              scope :needs_return, -> { where(needs_return: true) }
          
      262. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    262. 
            

            

            
          
      263. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    263. 
            

            

              # 
          
      264. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    264. 
            
              1
            

            

              def display_amount
          
      265. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    265. 
            

            

                return "" unless amount.present?
          
      266. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    266. 
            

            

            
          
      267. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    267. 
            

            

                # ActiveSupport::NumberHelper
          
      268. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    268. 
            

            

                "#{ActiveSupport::NumberHelper.number_to_delimited(amount)}"
          
      269. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    269. 
            

            

              end
          
      270. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    270. 
            

            

            
          
      271. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    271. 
            
              1
            

            

              def display_gift_date
          
      272. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    272. 
            

            

                gift_at.present? ? I18n.l(gift_at, format: :short) : ""
          
      273. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    273. 
            

            

              end
          
      274. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    274. 
            

            

            
          
      275. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    275. 
            
              1
            

            

              def display_item_name
          
      276. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    276. 
            

            

                item_name.presence || ""
          
      277. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    277. 
            

            

              end
          
      278. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    278. 
            

            

            
          
      279. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    279. 
            

            

              # 
          
      280. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    280. 
            
              1
            

            

              def main_image
          
      281. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    281. 
            

            

                images.attached? ? images.first : nil
          
      282. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    282. 
            

            

              end
          
      283. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    283. 
            

            

            
          
      284. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    284. 
            
              1
            

            

              def has_images?
          
      285. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    285. 
            

            

                valid_image_attachments.any?
          
      286. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    286. 
            

            

              end
          
      287. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    287. 
            

            

            
          
      288. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    288. 
            
              1
            

            

              def images_count
          
      289. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    289. 
            

            

                valid_image_attachments.count
          
      290. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    290. 
            

            

              end
          
      291. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    291. 
            

            

            
          
      292. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    292. 
            

            

              # def comments_allowed?
          
      293. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    293. 
            

            

              #   commentable?
          
      294. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    294. 
            

            

              # end
          
      295. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    295. 
            

            

            
          
      296. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    296. 
            

            

              # 
          
      297. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    297. 
            

            

              # - blobMIMEimage/*>0 
          
      298. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    298. 
            

            

              # - 
          
      299. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    299. 
            
              1
            

            

              def valid_image_attachments
          
      300. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    300. 
            

            

                return [] unless images.attached?
          
      301. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    301. 
            

            

            
          
      302. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    302. 
            

            

                images.attachments.select do |attachment|
          
      303. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    303. 
            

            

                  begin
          
      304. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    304. 
            

            

                    blob = attachment.blob
          
      305. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    305. 
            

            

                    blob.present? &&
          
      306. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    306. 
            

            

                      blob.content_type.to_s.start_with?("image/") &&
          
      307. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    307. 
            

            

                      blob.byte_size.to_i > 0
          
      308. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    308. 
            

            

                  rescue => e
          
      309. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    309. 
            

            

                    Rails.logger.warn ": #{e.class}: #{e.message} (attachment_id=#{attachment.id})"
          
      310. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    310. 
            

            

                    false
          
      311. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    311. 
            

            

                  end
          
      312. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    312. 
            

            

                end
          
      313. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    313. 
            

            

              end
          
      314. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    314. 
            

            

            
          
      315. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    315. 
            

            

             # OGP
          
      316. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    316. 
            
              1
            

            

             def image_suitable_for_ogp?(attachment)
          
      317. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    317. 
            

            

              # ActiveStorage::Attachment
          
      318. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    318. 
            

            

              return false unless attachment.is_a?(ActiveStorage::Attachment)
          
      319. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    319. 
            

            

            
          
      320. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    320. 
            

            

              # blob
          
      321. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    321. 
            

            

              return false unless attachment.blob.present?
          
      322. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    322. 
            

            

            
          
      323. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    323. 
            

            

              begin
          
      324. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    324. 
            

            

                blob = attachment.blob
          
      325. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    325. 
            

            

            
          
      326. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    326. 
            

            

                # 
          
      327. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    327. 
            

            

                return false unless blob.content_type&.start_with?("image/")
          
      328. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    328. 
            

            

            
          
      329. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    329. 
            

            

                # 
          
      330. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    330. 
            

            

                metadata = blob.metadata
          
      331. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    331. 
            

            

                return false unless metadata["width"] && metadata["height"]
          
      332. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    332. 
            

            

            
          
      333. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    333. 
            

            

                # 1.91:1 = 1200x630
          
      334. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    334. 
            

            

                aspect_ratio = metadata["width"].to_f / metadata["height"].to_f
          
      335. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    335. 
            

            

                suitable_ratio = (1.7..2.1).include?(aspect_ratio)
          
      336. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    336. 
            

            

            
          
      337. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    337. 
            

            

                # 
          
      338. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    338. 
            

            

                suitable_size = metadata["width"] >= 600 && metadata["height"] >= 315
          
      339. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    339. 
            

            

            
          
      340. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    340. 
            

            

                result = suitable_ratio && suitable_size
          
      341. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    341. 
            

            

            
          
      342. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    342. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "OGP: #{attachment.filename} - :#{metadata['width']}, :#{metadata['height']}, :#{aspect_ratio.round(2)}, :#{result}"
          
      343. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    343. 
            

            

            
          
      344. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    344. 
            

            

                result
          
      345. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    345. 
            

            

              rescue => e
          
      346. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    346. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.error "OGP: #{e.message}"
          
      347. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    347. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.error "Attachment: #{attachment.inspect}"
          
      348. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    348. 
            

            

                false

              def notification_days_before

                hour, minute = time_str.split(":").map(&:to_i)
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            

                unless HOURS_RANGE.cover?(hour) && minute.between?(0, MAX_MINUTE)

                # days_before

    123. 
            

            

                notification_date = notification_at - days_before.to_i.days

      125.

      128.

                true

              def notification_message

    138.

              def notification_timing_is_valid
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            

            

                return unless notification_at.present?

                days_before = notification_days_before

    191.

      196.

    197. 
            

            

                # 0:00-23:30
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            

            

                time_str = notification_time
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            

            

                return unless time_str.present?
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            

            

            
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            

            

                hour, minute = time_str.split(":").map(&:to_i)
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            

            

            
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            

            

                unless HOURS_RANGE.cover?(hour) && HALF_HOUR_MINUTES.include?(minute)
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204.

      205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    205.

              rescue StandardError

              def no_duplicate_unsent_reminders

                if duplicate_query.exists?

              def recent_gift_records(limit = RECENT_GIFT_RECORDS_DEFAULT_LIMIT)

              def monthly_gift_summary(date = Date.current)

    73. 
            

            

                gift_records

                  .where(gift_at: date.beginning_of_month..date.end_of_month)

              def send_due_reminders
          
      18.

                due_reminds = Remind.due_today.includes(:user, gift_person: :relationship)

              def send_reminder_notification(remind)

    41. 
            

            

                unless remind.should_notify?

      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                  return false
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                end
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

            
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                line_user_id = get_line_user_id(remind.user)

    47. 
            

            

                unless line_user_id
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48.

                  return false

    50. 
            

            

                end
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

            
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                message = build_reminder_message(remind)
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.info "Sending LINE message to user ID: #{remind.user_id}, LINE ID: #{line_user_id}"
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

            
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                begin
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56.

              def get_line_user_id(user)

              def build_reminder_message(remind)
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

                person_name = remind.gift_person.name
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

                relationship = remind.gift_person.relationship&.name || ""
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

                anniversary_date = remind.notification_at.strftime("%Y%m%d")
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

                notification_date = remind.notification_sent_at.in_time_zone.to_date
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

            
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            

                #  
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            

                if notification_date == remind.notification_at
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            

                  message_text = "  \n\n"
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            

                  message_text += "#{person_name}#{relationship}\n"
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            

                  message_text += " #{anniversary_date}\n\n"
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            

                  message_text += "\n"
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            

                else
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            

                  days_until = (remind.notification_at - notification_date).to_i
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            

                  message_text = "  \n\n"

    101.

      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            

                  message_text += " #{anniversary_date}\n\n"
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            

                  message_text += "\n"
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            

                end
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            

            
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            

                message_text += ""
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            

            
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            

                Line::Bot::V2::MessagingApi::TextMessage.new(
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            

                  text: message_text
          
      110.

                )

              def self.default_fallback_url(request)

      8.

                  url = helpers.image_url("ogp.webp", host: request.base_url)
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

            
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                  url = url.sub(%r{^http://}, "https://") if Rails.env.production?
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11.

                  Rails.logger.info "OgpUrlService result: #{url}"

      14.

                rescue => e

            class WebpConversionService

              def self.convert_attachment!(attachment, quality: 85)
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

                return unless attachment.is_a?(ActiveStorage::Attachment)
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

            
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

                blob = attachment.blob
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                return unless blob.present?
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                return unless blob.content_type.to_s.start_with?("image/")
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                return if blob.content_type.to_s == "image/webp" || attachment.filename.to_s.downcase.end_with?(".webp")
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

            
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                original_blob = blob
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

            
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                blob.open do |file|
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                  require "mini_magick"
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                  image = MiniMagick::Image.open(file.path)
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                  image.auto_orient
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                  image.strip
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

            
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                  tmp_out = Tempfile.new([ "attachment_#{attachment.id}", ".webp" ])
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                  tmp_out.binmode
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                  begin
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                    image.format("webp") { |c| c.quality quality.to_s }
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

                    image.write(tmp_out.path)
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

            
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                    new_filename = build_webp_filename(attachment.filename.to_s)
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                    new_blob = nil
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                    File.open(tmp_out.path, "rb") do |f|
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

                      new_blob = ActiveStorage::Blob.create_and_upload!(
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

                        io: f,
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                        filename: new_filename,
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                        content_type: "image/webp"
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

                      )
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                    end
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                    new_blob.analyze_later
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

            
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                    attachment.update!(blob: new_blob)
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                    purge_blob_if_unattached(original_blob)
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                  ensure
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                    tmp_out.close!
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                  end
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                end
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

              rescue => e
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                Rails.logger.error "[WebpConversionService] convert_attachment! error: #{e.class} - #{e.message} (attachment_id=#{attachment&.id})"
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

              end
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

            
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

              def self.build_webp_filename(original_name)
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                base = File.basename(original_name, File.extname(original_name))
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                "#{base}.webp"
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

              end
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

              private_class_method :build_webp_filename
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

            
          
      54.

              def self.purge_blob_if_unattached(blob)
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                return unless blob.present?
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                unless ActiveStorage::Attachment.where(blob_id: blob.id).exists?
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                  blob.purge_later
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                end
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

              end
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

              private_class_method :purge_blob_if_unattached
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

            end
